message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $120 is a bit higher than I'm looking to spend right now. I'm willing to pay $105 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $115. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
